name: Together (itch) (luisquid, rsofia)
description:
Grab my hand and don't let go! 

Gather as many people as you can, avoid the obstacles in your way and build your community. 

Use mouse to move the camera. 

Left click to select person, scroll wheel to zoom in and out.

This is an entry for the 2020 ONU Mujeres Jam.
